summary: A woman suffering from kleptomania is hypnotized in an attempt to cure her. Soon afterwards, she's found at the scene of a murder with no memory of how she got there, and seemingly no way to prove her innocence.
cast: Gene Tierney|Richard Conte|José Ferrer|Charles Bickford|Barbara O'Neil|Eduard Franz|Constance Collier|Fortunio Bonanova|Beau Anderson|Myrtle Anderson|Gail Bonney|Lovyss Bradley|Margaret Brayton|Sue Carlton|Ruth Clifford|Clancy Cooper|Oliver Cross|Joan Dix|Lawrence Dobkin|Johnny Duncan|Eddie Dunn|Jay Eaton|Charles Flynn|Sally Forrest|Robert Foulk|Robert Garvin|Alex Gerry|Bruce Hamilton|Phyllis Hill|Mauritz Hugo|Ted Jordan|Larry Keating|Ruth Lee|Ian MacDonald|Joyce Mackenzie|Harold Miller|Roger Moore|Howard Negley|Wanda Perry|Anitra Sparrow|Randy Stuart|John Trebach|Nancy Valentine|Jane Van Duser|Lillian West|Helen Westcott|Mack Williams|Shirley Witkin|Margaret Zane
title: Vorágine
